definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: Electronic music and raw sound effects fill the air.
sentences.chinese: 電子音樂和原始的音效在空氣中迴盪。

sentences.english: Utility to record and play sounds by using a sound card .
sentences.chinese: 使用音效卡錄製並播放聲音的實用程式。

sentences.english: This should match your sound card type and jumper settings.
sentences.chinese: 這應該和您的音效卡及跳線設定一致。

sentences.english: Digital sound effects add to the fun for those with sound cards.
sentences.chinese: 數字聲音效果添加到的樂趣，對於那些與音效卡。

sentences.english: Two awards for sound? Three awards for short subjects?
The game comes with some fascinating sound effects.
Certain types of multimedia audio and video files are unplayable .
sentences.chinese: 這也使得多媒體的音效及影像不能被撥放。

sentences.english: Most computers today come with a basic video and sound card .
sentences.chinese: 多數電腦，今天來了一個基本的視頻和音效卡。

sentences.english: Playful music and sound effects accompany each game.
sentences.chinese: 遊戲過程當中始終伴有各種好玩的音樂和音效。

sentences.english: Only use compatible stereo headphones to listen to stereo audio.
sentences.chinese: 只有使用兼容立體聲耳機纔可收聽到立體聲音效。

sentences.english: And the acoustics are very good in Madison Square Garden
sentences.chinese: 麥迪遜廣場花園的音效很好。

sentences.english: When rhe show begins, the pictures and sounds seem to swallow you up.
sentences.chinese: 電影開影時，畫面和音效似乎就要把你吞下去。

sentences.english: Within the theatre, Maja has done everything from producing to sound.
sentences.chinese: 在戲劇領域，瑪雅從製作到音效從事過各種工作。

sentences.english: A very cute picture, sound lovelier, equally suitable for girls.
sentences.chinese: 畫面很可愛，音效更可愛，同樣適合女生。

sentences.english: Output devices include video displays and sound synthesizers.
sentences.chinese: 輸出設備包括顯示器和音效合成器。

sentences.english: PR:Only digital reverb, chorus, and occasionally delay.
sentences.chinese: 只用數字化混響，合唱有時用點延遲音效。

definition: the feeling of actually being there
sound/acoustics/audio/hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. for 組合音響|组合音响[zu3 he2 yin1 xiang3]
sound track/track number (e.g. on a CD)
loudspeaker box/speaker (audio equipment)/resonating chamber of a musical instrument/sound box
